html.p: Select the Application Name from the dropdown

table.title: Most Popular Lists
table.searchTemplate: sourcetype="SharepointAuditLogger" ItemType=List ApplicationName=$ApplicationName$ | top ListName by ApplicationName

table.title: Large List Usage
table.searchTemplate: sourcetype="SharepointAuditLogger" ApplicationName=$ApplicationName$ NOT ItemName=""|eval ItemSizeKB=round(ItemSize/1024)|eval SiteQuota=round(((ItemSizeKB/(StorageMaximumLevelMB*1024))*1002),2)|stats dc(ItemName) by ApplicationName,ItemName,ItemSizeKB,SiteQuota,UserName|fields - dc(ItemName) |rename SiteQuota as "Site Quota %"| sort -ItemSizeKB
